unnormalised: SBI annnounced a revised schedule for its online banking services due to planned maintenance on 27/10/2024. Customers might experience intermittent service disruptions between 11:30 PM and 3:30 AM IST. This is to facilitate upgrades to improve security and performance of YONO app and internet banking.
normalised: S B I announced a revised schedule for its online banking services due to planned maintenance on twenty seventh October two thousand and twenty four. Customers might experience intermittent service disruptions between eleven thirty P M and three thirty A M I S T. This is to facilitate upgrades to improve security and performance of Y O N O app and internet banking.

unnormalised: The bank stated that during this period, UPI transactions, net banking transfers like IMPS, NEFT, and RTGS might be temporarily unavailable. Customers are advised to plan their transactions accordingly or use ATM services for urgent needs. SBI has been actively promoting digital transactions, with over 70% of its customers now using online platforms.
normalised: The bank stated that during this period, U P I transactions, net banking transfers like I M P S, N E F T, and R T G S might be temporarily unavailable. Customers are advised to plan their transactions accordingly or use A T M services for urgent needs. S B I has been actively promoting digital transactions, with over seventy percent of its customers now using online platforms.

unnormalised: "We regret any inconvenience caused," said Mr. Rajesh Kumar, Chief General Manager, SBI. "These system upgrades are crucial for maintaining the integrity of our services and safeguarding customer data. Normal service will resume by 4:00 AM on 28/10/2024. For any queries, please contact our customer care at 1800-11-2211."
normalised: "We regret any inconvenience caused," said Mister Rajesh Kumar, Chief General Manager, S B I. "These system upgrades are crucial for maintaining the integrity of our services and safeguarding customer data. Normal service will resume by four A M on twenty eighth October two thousand and twenty four. For any queries, please contact our customer care at one eight hundred hyphen eleven hyphen two thousand two hundred and eleven."
